messages.title: He's hoping you'll vote Lib Dem
messages.content: A vote for the Lib Dems or any other party will let the Tories win.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Many Lib Dem voters would be horrified to watch the Lib Dems hand power to the Tories. But up and down the country this is what has happened.

quotes.text: Nick Clegg will back Tories in hung Parliament
Clegg could support Tories in a minority government
Clegg reveals Lib Dems prepared to join Tories in coalition
CLEGG: I WOULD BACK TORIES IN HUNG POLL

leaflet.additionalNotes: Share of the vote at the last general election: Labour 35.3%, Tory 32.3%, Lib Dem 22.1%. Local councils controlled by Tory-Lib Dem deals listed.
